As a new volunteer, you have a few hours of flight training, the Spitfire Pilot's Notes and a ticket to the nearest aerodrome. Now is your opportunity to join the ranks of those who valiantly defended Great Britain from the Nazi juggernaut!

software.name: Spitting Image
software.Description: Spitting Image is an Action game, developed by Walking Circles and published by Domark, which was released in Europe in 1988.

software.name: Spy vs Spy: Arctic Antics
software.Description: The crazy duo form MAD Magazine continue their fight! This time, your fight takes place in the frozen arctic. Find the essential components of a brand new rocket, before you freeze to death, AND before your opponent - the deadly Black Spy. Polar bears, thin ice, igloos, snowdrifts and of course the SNOWBALL FIGHT all feature in the continuing saga of the two Spys. Featuring the amazing 'Simulvision', you can play against the computer or a friend in this crazy, comical race against time.

software.name: Spy vs Spy: The Island Caper
software.Description: "The Island Caper" takes place on an exotic tropical island complete with a still-active volcano and other natural hazards. On the islands (in some levels there is more than one) buried in the sands are parts of the top secret X-14 1/2 missile which has crash landed there. Your mission is to find all 3 parts of the missile and assemble them in order for you to escape by submarine before the volcano erupts. Beware of shark attacks, snare traps, quicksand, coconut bombs, fire bombs and sword fights! Featuring full-scrolling screens, real-time animation, booby trap construction and Simulvision - both players active at the same time.

Release.name: Spy vs Spy: The Island Caper

ReleaseImages.Image: Spy vs Spy The Island Caper (EU)-102873_front.jpg
Spy vs Spy The Island Caper (EU)-102873_back.jpg

software.name: Spy vs. Spy
software.Description: It's the crazy duo from MAD Magazine! Can you escape from the Embassy, together with passport, secret plans, key and travellers checks, AND before your plane leaves? Featuring outstanding high-resolution character animation, two-player simultaneous play and a unique split-screen layout which allows both players to play independently.

software.name: Spy Who Loved Me, The
software.Description: The Spy Who Loved Me is an Action game, developed by The Kremlin and published by Domark, which was released in Europe in 1990.

software.name: ST Karate
software.Description: Welcome to ST Karate! To gain your way into the upper sect of the holy order, something your father always wanted of you, you must defeat many opponents. Your journey will be a difficult one with the finest fighters in the land trying to stop you. From time to time you may be required to perform tests to prove your purity of mind and body.

software.name: Star Blaze
software.Description: To qualify as a Tamsinian warrior in an intergalactic war of unparalleled ferocity, you must prove your prowess by taking on scores of fiendish alien attack waves and living to tell the tale. How will you do it? Only with quick reactions and the fastest trigger finger on the planet!

software.name: Star Command
software.Description: Star Command is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by SSI, which was released in 1988.

software.name: Star Goose
software.Description: Top-gun Star Fighter Scouser-Gitt was fed up to his back teeth with combat missions. If you've scrolled-n-blasted your way over one landscape you've scrolled 'em all. The whole Universe gets to look like Straight City. That's until he landed the mind-boggling mission to raid the warped 3-D world of the Nom: Survive the defense landscapes, shoot through the supply tunnels, grab the jewels! And cop this-he even gets a new Fighter-the STARGOOSE itself!

software.name: Star Goose!
software.Description: Top-gun Star Fighter Scouser-Gitt was fed up to his back teeth with combat missions. If you've scrolled-n-blasted your way over one landscape you've scrolled 'em all. The whole Universe gets to look like Straight City. That's until he landed the mind-boggling mission to raid the warped 3-D world of the Nom: Survive the defense landscapes, shoot through the supply tunnels, grab the jewels! And cop this-he even gets a new Fighter-the STARGOOSE itself!

software.name: Star Raiders
software.Description: Zycroids, savage robots from deep space, are invading our galaxy, destroying all life. Star Raiders are the only force in the Federation strong enough to resist the aliens. We have to find more pilots or the galaxy is doomed! We're giving you command of our more advanced fighter, the Star Cruiser. Time runs short, Star Raider! Shields up and good luck!

software.name: Star Trek: The Rebel Universe
software.Description: In response to the greatest challenge that Starfleet Command has ever faced, the crew of the Starship Enterprise have been ordered to take their vessel into what has become the most dangerous area of the galaxy, the Klein sphere. Facing legions of rebel Federation Starships, and Klingon and Romulan Battle Cruisers, Captain James T. Kirk and the crew of the U.S.S. Enterprise must quell the rebellion and restore peace to the galaxy.

software.name: Star Wars
software.Description: You're at the controls of LUKE's X-WING FIGHTER, heading straight for the DEATH STAR. Your mission: to destroy it before the EMPIRE seeks its revenge on the REBEL base. Lock your sights on attacking TIE FIGHTERS and blast them with your proton torpedoes. Race along the DEATH STAR's surface, firing on giant towers. Finally, dive full throttle into the DEATH STAR's equatorial trench. You'll need split-second timing to avoid all the obstacles as you streak through the trench in search of the main reactor. Hit it and you've blown the DEATH STAR out of existence! MAY THE FORCE BE WITH YOU.

software.name: Star Wars Trilogy, The
software.Description: The Star Wars Trilogy is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Domark, which was released in Europe in 1988.

software.name: Star Wars: Return of the Jedi
software.Description: Return of the Jedi picks up the action of the movie where the Rebel forces begin their attack against the Imperial Death Star. In the first level you control Princess Leia on her Speederbike through the forest of Endor, to the safety of the Ewok village. You leave Leia there and go to another part of the forest to control Chewbacca's Scout Walker. There, Han Solo is waiting to deactivate the shields protecting the Death Star. On the second and third levels you control Chewbacca and Lando Calrissian as he flies the Millenium Falcon. Lando flies close to the Death Star fighting off a mighty attack from TIE Fighters. The Millenium Falcon enters the Death Star and travels down a dangerous corridor towards the central reactor. Blast the reactor and then turn around to get away from the Death Star as it blows up!

Release.name: Star Wars: Return of the Jedi

ReleaseImages.Image: Star Wars Return of the Jedi (EU)-42320_front.jpg
Star Wars Return of the Jedi (EU)-42320_back.jpg
Star Wars Return of the Jedi (EU)-42320_side.jpg

software.name: Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back
software.Description: This game follows the non-stop action of the movie and is a direct conversion of the famous coin-op. All games players and STAR WARS fans alike will enjoy this version of the world's best known space-age epic. Brought to you by the team who produced the top-selling STAR WARS game, THE EMPIRE STRIKES BACK is the next stage of the unfolding drama. The player takes the role of Luke Skywalker, piloting a snow-speeder against the huge Imperial Walkers. Darth Vader controls his forces with deadly cunning, using his Probots to search and attack the Rebel Base. The action continues as the player becomes Han Solo in the Millenium Falcon, looking for safety in the galaxy whilst being attacked by Tie-Fighters and dodging asteroid storms.

Release.name: Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back

ReleaseImages.Image: Star Wars The Empire Strikes Back (EU)-30619_front.jpg

software.name: Starbyte Super Soccer
software.Description: Starbyte Super Soccer is a Sports game, developed and published by Starbyte, which was released in Europe in 1991.

software.name: Starcross
software.Description: Starcross is an Adventure game, developed and published by Infocom, which was released in 1985.

software.name: Stardust
software.Description: Stardust is an Action game, developed by Aggression and published by Bloodhouse, which was released in Europe in 1995.

software.name: Starflight
software.Description: An alien mystery darkens the galaxy! Command a powerful starship and crew on a mission to save the galaxy's future by discovering the secrets of its past. Explore 270 star systems and 800 planets: gas giants, lava worlds and more. Unload your starship's arsenal in real-time combat against alien warships. Search hostile planet surfaces with violent storms, brutal terrains and savage beasts.

software.name: Starglider
software.Description: You are in command of Novenia's last Airborne Ground Attack Vehicle, with limited weaponry and fuel, with no apparent means of replenishment. Using high-energy single-pulse beam lasers and TV guided missiles, you must overcome the sophisticated strategies of the invading Ergon air and ground forces, led by Fleet Commander Hermann Krudd in the spacefleet starship... the STARGLIDER! The challenge begins now!

software.name: Starglider 2
software.Description: You're back for more! Overwhelming odds are stacked against you. But you climb into the cockpit to rid - once and for all - the Egron forces out to destroy your home planet, Novenia. Starglider II, the eagerly awaited sequel to Starglider, streaks onto the screen with more astonishing graphics than ever imagined! Three dimensional instrument panel lets you soar through this interplanetary battle of aliens and mutated monsters.

software.name: Starglider II
software.Description: You're back for more! Overwhelming odds are stacked against you. But you climb into the cockpit to rid - once and for all - the Egron forces out to destroy your home planet, Novenia. Starglider II, the eagerly awaited sequel to Starglider, streaks onto the screen with more astonishing graphics than ever imagined! Three dimensional instrument panel lets you soar through this interplanetary battle of aliens and mutated monsters.

software.name: Starquake
software.Description: A message has just reached Earth that an unstable planet has emerged from a black hole on the edge of the galaxy. If the core of this planet is not rebuilt, it will implode causing the whole universe to destroy itself in a starquake! You, the Bio-Logically Operated Being have just been volunteered for this exceedingly hazardous task!

software.name: StarRay
software.Description: StarRay is an Action game, developed by Hidden Treasures and published by Logotron, which was released in Europe in 1988.

software.name: Stationfall
software.Description: Stationfall is an Adventure game, developed and published by Infocom, which was released in 1987.

software.name: Steel Empire
software.Description: Steel Empire is a Strategy game, developed by Silicon Knights and published by Millennium, which was released in Europe in 1992.

software.name: Steg the Slug
software.Description: It's slime time with Steg the Slug! T'yungunz need some nosh and Steg needs to feed them. So strap on the bionic legs and engage that rocket pack. Steg's slug family needs raisin'! Slippery, slimey fun for all!

software.name: Stellar Crusade
software.Description: Stellar Crusade is a Strategy game, developed and published by SSI, which was released in 1988.

software.name: Steve Davis World Snooker
software.Description: Steve Davis World Snooker is a Sports game, developed by Binary Design and published by CDS Software, which was released in Europe in 1989.

software.name: Stone Age
software.Description: Stone Age is a Puzzle game, developed by Stonehenge Soft and published by Eclipse Software, which was released in Europe in 1992.

software.name: Storm Master
software.Description: Storm Master is a Strategy game, developed and published by Silmarils, which was released in Europe in 1991.

software.name: Stormball
software.Description: Stormball is a Sports game, developed and published by Millennium, which was released in Europe in 1991.

software.name: Stormlord
software.Description: Free the imprisoned fairy folk before they are obliterated by an evil Queen. She stoops to conquer the land Stormlord inhabits, destroying the peaceful euphoria with each annihilation. Stormlord's mission - free the captured and defend the peace and tranquility of his realm. Unfortunately, he must repel the wicked monarch, but should he fail, the evil Queen and her dark sovereignty will reign forever...

software.name: Stormtrooper
software.Description: Stormtrooper is an Action game, developed and published by Creation, which was released in Europe in 1988.

software.name: STOS Compiler
software.Description: Now you can really add some zing to any of your programs and bring them closer to the speed of commercial machine-code games. The Compiler is simplicity itself to use. Update your STOS language disc to version 2.4 using the special accessory, then when you boot STOS, the Compiler is available with two key presses. If you have enough memory you can hold both the original program and the compiled version in ram at the same time and switch between them. In addition there's a brand new single-precision floating point routine which is many times faster than the original routine included with STOS: SIN and COS run 30 times faster!

software.name: STOS Maestro
software.Description: Add a remarkable level of realism to your games! Now you can incorporate dramatic sampled sounds in all of your programs and make them bristle with atmosphere. Grab sound effects and music from commercial games, record your own sounds, use the comprehensive cut and paste facilities to edit samples, enhance samples with Amplify, Fade in/out, Filter and Pack, and much, much more!

software.name: STOS Maestro Plus
software.Description: Add a remarkable level of realism to your games! Now you can incorporate dramatic sampled sounds in all of your programs and make them bristle with atmosphere. Grab sound effects and music from commercial games, record your own sounds, use the comprehensive cut and paste facilities to edit samples, enhance samples with Amplify, Fade in/out, Filter and Pack, and much, much more!

software.name: STOS Sprites 600
software.Description: STOS Sprites 600 is a collection of more than 600 animated sprites, ready for you to use in any of your games. What's more, there's a demonstration program on the disc which shows you how to link the sprite frames together to produce realistic animation. These beautifully-designed sprites have been created by the talented artist responsible for almost all the graphics in STOS - The Game Creator, and will give you hundreds of ideas for using in your own original games.

software.name: STOS The Game Creator
software.Description: STOS is a revolutionary package which has everything you need to create fast, exciting games quickly and easily. Whether you've never written a game before or you're a competent programmer, you'll find that STOS is a perfect way to design your own entertainment software.

software.name: Stratego
software.Description: Stratego is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Imagitec Design, Inc. and published by Rainbow Arts, which was released in 1990.

software.name: Street Fighter
software.Description: Street Fighter is an Action game, developed by Capcom and published by Go!, which was released in 1988.

software.name: Street Fighter II
software.Description: The monster has been released! STREET FIGHTER II brings the world's best street fighters together to find the undisputed champion. The time has come for you to flex those biceps and stand strong against the onslaught from the competition. Have you got what it takes to become the ultimate world warrior? Featuring gargantuan sprites and stunning fights, this is the game that machines were made for!

software.name: Strider
software.Description: Stand by, Strider. Upon receiving your orders from the commander, you are dropped into the heart of Russia, armed with only your lightning-quick sword. Your task is to infiltrate the Red Army and return enemy secrets to your superiors. Your mission begins in Red Square, but after fighting off KGB attacks there, your clues lead you to the snow-capped mountains of Siberia to battle both the elements and the enemy. If you survive this icy test, your orders are to proceed south to the Lowlands where jungle tribes wait with spears and poison arrows. Now you must return to Moscow to face the Grand Master of the Red Army. It is vital that you get to him before he destroys you or the world will fall under Russian control. The free world relies on your success!

software.name: Strider II
software.Description: The warrior returns with a vengeance in his ultimate fight for freedom! A flash of steel, a blast from his devastating laser Gyro gun - Strider's back in action, pulverizing the enemy and striving for justice. This time, there will be NO LIMITS... NO MERCY... NO SURRENDER!

software.name: Strike Force Harrier
software.Description: Strike Force Harrier puts you in the cockpit for a full flight and combat simulation of one of Britain's most exciting fighter aircraft. Your objective is to bomb the enemy HQ, at the same time defending yourself and your ground sites from enemy aircraft and ground forces. You have cannon, bombs, and Sidewinder heat-seeking missiles at your disposal - but the enemy is just as well-armed as you are. You can select either practice or combat level, with a skill level of pilot, commander or ace. At the end of each mission your score is given, calculated on the basis of your distance from the enemy HQ.

software.name: Strip Poker
software.Description: Strip Poker: A Sizzling Game of Chance is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Artworx Software Company, which was released in 1987.

Release.name: Strip Poker: A Sizzling Game of Chance

ReleaseImages.Image: Strip Poker A Sizzling Game of Chance (US)-78644_front.jpg
Strip Poker A Sizzling Game of Chance (US)-78644_back.jpg

software.name: Strip Poker: A Sizzling Game of Chance
software.Description: Strip Poker: A Sizzling Game of Chance is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Artworx Software Company, which was released in 1987.

Release.name: Strip Poker: A Sizzling Game of Chance

ReleaseImages.Image: Strip Poker A Sizzling Game of Chance (US)-78644_front.jpg
Strip Poker A Sizzling Game of Chance (US)-78644_back.jpg

software.name: Stryx
software.Description: You're really up against it this time. These revolting robots have finally upped and turned their horribly powerful weapons on their kind human masters. Someone's got to stop it before it all gets out of hand. I mean, you just can't have bloodthirsty cyborg assassins roaming the streets of Dome City and expect the citizens to put up with it. Who on earth is going to sort out this mess? You guessed it - you get the job! Fortunately, you are just a little bit on the special side. You are Stryx, the product of Project Alpha Secure, the meanest fighting, smartest thinking machine ever invented. Half-man, half-robot, you are the business, the only one who can stop those wicked cyborgs. You'll have to work hard, though, blasting hordes of the revolting creatures and rescuing the keys to the Lifeforce. So, Stryx, you'd better get your jetpack on for some high level robot stomping through the immensely complex underground world of the Dome cities. It's a tough assignment, and time is running out.

software.name: Stunt Car Racer
software.Description: Open the throttle fully and 'pull g'. Your turbo-charged V8 engine hugs banked curves before climbing up and away off a ramp hundreds of feet above the ground. Glide past your opponent in mid-air before crashing back onto the track, your chassis shuddering and tires squealing. No time to look back - the next bend looms and you're still not in full control! As a Stunt Car Racer, you're blasting around eight roller-coaster tracks at over 200 miles an hour, pitting your wits and high speed driving skills against computer controlled opponents or a friend via a datalink cable, all in amazingly fast, smooth 3D graphics. If you survive to become Division One champion, you're in the Superleague with a machine twice as powerful. Stop your car breaking up under the strain and then accelerate still further. There are no prizes for second place in this game - It's all or nothing!

software.name: Substation
software.Description: Substation is an Action game, developed and published by Unique Development Studios, which was released in Europe in 1995.

software.name: SunDog: Frozen Legacy
software.Description: Experience the thrill of real-time 3D space combat as you defend against pirates intent upon stealing your cargo. Set shields and return fire with laser or particle cannon. Wander through 3D detailed cities. Walk into a building and the ZoomAction windows put you inside where the action is... with full animation. Roam freely through the most detailed universe ever put on a disc. Visit over 50 different cities on 18 worlds grouped into 12 star systems. Each world and city is beautifully detailed and shown in full color on scrolling screen displays.

software.name: Super Breakout
software.Description: Super Breakout is an Action game, developed by Paradox Software and published by Atari, which was released in 1987.

software.name: Super Cars
software.Description: Get ready for some high-speed racing action! Select your car and strap on the extras, then power your way through 27 stages of highway horror, engaging in mile after mile of awesome motorized combat! Do you have the driving skills necessary to come out on top?

software.name: Super Cars II
software.Description: Super Cars II is a Racing game, developed by Magnetic Fields and published by Gremlin Graphics, which was released in Europe in 1991.

software.name: Super Grand Prix
software.Description: Incredible multi-play action! Race Formula One, 500cc Bikes, Dragsters, Go-Cart, Bigfoot and many more! The excitement - power slides, hairpins, 360's, oil slicks, crashes, explosions! The playability - frantic race-against-the-clock, competitive multi-player options, responsive car controls, special action replay feature. Race the computer or race your friends!

software.name: Super Hang-On
software.Description: Roar onto your home computer screen with a shower of dust and rubber with Electric Dream's officially licensed version of Sega's chart-topping coin-op SUPER HANG-ON - the greatest motorcycle racing game ever! The thrills are so real we even considered making a helmet compulsory. Choose from four skill levels and four separate music tracks. Expert riders can push their turbo-charged racing machines through 18 progressive stages, racing across Asia, Africa, America and Europe.

software.name: Super Huey UH-IX
software.Description: Super Huey UH-IX is a Simulation game, developed by Cosmi and published by U.S. Gold, which was released in Europe in 1988.

software.name: Super Monaco GP
software.Description: Burn up the track on the straights and downshift into neck-wrenching hairpin curves with Super Monaco GP. Set your wheels alight, screaming around the most demanding tracks on earth - the Formula that takes you to pole position. Burn rubber with the best drivers around in a piston-pounding test of speed, road savvy, and endurance!

software.name: Super Skweek
software.Description: Super Skweek is a Puzzle game, developed and published by Loriciels, which was released in Europe in 1990.

software.name: Super Space Invaders
software.Description: Space Invaders is the most famous video game ever! Now SUPER SPACE INVADERS has arrived with a host of amazing new features - wave after wave of weird and hostile aliens, fantastic multiway scrolling playfields, huge end of level mega monsters and secret levels for only the best to find! It'll drive you crazy, but you won't be able to leave it alone!

software.name: Super Sprint
software.Description: Feel the need for speed? Want to live life in the fast lane? Then shift into Super Sprint, the arcade hit that's racing action at its very best! Race by yourself against computer-controlled cars or join a friend in a pedal-to-the-metal race for the finish line. Your driving skills will be tested by several exciting tracks, each with so many obstacles it'll drive you nuts. Pick up wrenches along the way to customize your car with super traction, higher top speed or turbo acceleration. Go ahead. Burn some rubber and kick some asphalt!

software.name: Super Tennis
software.Description: Match Point is a Sports game, developed by D&L; Research and published by MichTron Inc., which was released in 1985.

software.name: Super Wonder Boy in Monster Land
software.Description: Wonderboy is back! This time as an adventurous adolescent who must slay the ferocious fire-breathing MEKA dragon before peace can return to Wonderland. Tom-Tom takes on the most malicious monsters ever known. Collect treasures along the way to strengthen and protect yourself. There lies ahead the greatest challenge - a nightmarish adventure of the force of good against evil, as once more the peace-loving people of Wonderland turn to Super Wonderboy to free them from the grasp of MEKA and his murderous monsters!

Release.name: Super Wonder Boy in Monster Land

ReleaseImages.Image: Super Wonder Boy in Monster Land (EU)-88017_front.jpg
Super Wonder Boy in Monster Land (EU)-88017_back.jpg

software.name: Superman: The Man of Steel
software.Description: Superman: The Man of Steel is an Action game, developed and published by Tynesoft, which was released in Europe in 1989.

software.name: Superski II
software.Description: Superski II is a Sports game, developed and published by Microids, which was released in Europe in 1990.

software.name: Superstar Ice Hockey
software.Description: Speed skating, slap shots, hip checks, slick passes. It's all here in Superstar Ice Hockey! Play center or goalie, coach the team, build up the franchise as general manager, or do all three. Ice your opponents for the league championship. Featuring fast action, strategy, 1 and 2 player options, exciting graphics and animation, and a realistic 4-division league.

software.name: Supremacy: Your Will Be Done
software.Description: Supremacy: Your Will Be Done is a Strategy game, developed by Probe Software and published by Virgin Mastertronic, which was released in Europe in 1990.

software.name: Suspect
software.Description: Suspect is an Adventure game, developed and published by Infocom, which was released in 1985.

software.name: Suspended
software.Description: Suspended is an Adventure game, developed and published by Infocom, which was released in 1984.

software.name: Suspicious Cargo
software.Description: Suspicious Cargo is an Adventure game, developed by Exile and published by Gremlin Interactive, which was released in Europe in 1991.

software.name: Switchblade
software.Description: Hiro, last of the Bladeknights, must reassemble the sixteen fragments of the shattered Fireblade. Only then can he take on Havoc and avenge his people's death. Do you have the necessary skills and courage to help Hiro succeed in this challenging quest?

software.name: Switchblade II
software.Description: Switchblade II is an Action game, developed and published by Gremlin Graphics, which was released in Europe in 1991.

software.name: Table Tennis Simulation
software.Description: A game for the whole family to enjoy! Endless entertainment with world championships or friendly tournaments. Featuring singles or doubles games, TT-technics attack, defense and all-around skills, realistic life on a table tennis table. Game, set and match to Starbyte!

software.name: Tactical Manager
software.Description: Tactical Manager is a Sports game, developed by Talking Birds and published by Black Legend, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Tales of the Unknown, Volume I: The Bard's Tale
software.Description: First you explored the city. Then the cellars and sewers below. Now you're trapped in Harkyn's Castle. Seven levels conquered and still 9 to go. Command 4 different classes of Magic User: Conjurer, Magician, Sorcerer and Wizard, each with unique spells. And the Bard who makes magic with music. 85 spells in all. But choose well - the wrong spell and you're history! Pushes the power of your computer to its limits. So it's fast. It's big. And there's plenty of power for 3D scrolling, full color mazes, amazing sound effects and animated color monsters. Each level is demanding and different. There are more monsters, mazes, "specials", logic puzzles and magic items than you've ever seen in a game like this before!
software.AKA: The Bard's Tale: Tales of the Unknown (EU)

Release.name: Tales of the Unknown, Volume I: The Bard's Tale

ReleaseImages.Image: Tales of the Unknown, Volume I The Bard's Tale (US)-99352_front.jpg

Release.name: The Bard's Tale: Tales of the Unknown

ReleaseImages.Image: The Bard's Tale Tales of the Unknown (EU)-99353_front.jpg
The Bard's Tale Tales of the Unknown (EU)-99353_back.jpg
The Bard's Tale Tales of the Unknown (EU)-99353_side.jpg

software.name: Tangram
software.Description: Tangram is a Puzzle game, developed and published by Thalion, which was released in Europe in 1991.

software.name: Tass Times in Tonetown
software.Description: Tass Times in Tonetown is an Adventure game, developed by Interplay and published by Activision, which was released in 1986.

software.name: Team Yankee
software.Description: Team Yankee is the definitive action simulation of modern tank warfare. Watch scenarios unfold on 3D battlefields with high definition graphics and keep track of the four tank platoons you control using the unique 4 quadrant display. Defend Hill 214 from Yuri Potecknov's crack tank platoons, attack Objective Link through sniper fire from forests, and protect the Langen Gap from an entire Soviet tank battalion at night. Five major scenarios based on the battles featured in the New York Times No. 1 best-seller Team Yankee.

software.name: Techno Cop
software.Description: Techno Cop is an Action game, developed by Gray Matter and published by Gremlin Interactive, which was released in Europe in 1988.

software.name: Teenage Mutant Hero Turtles: The Coin-Op!
software.Description: Teenage Mutant Hero Turtles: The Coin-Op! is an Action game, developed by Probe Software and published by Imageworks, which was released in Europe in 1991.

Release.name: Teenage Mutant Hero Turtles: The Coin-Op!

ReleaseImages.Image: Teenage Mutant Hero Turtles The Coin-Op! (EU)-603499_front.jpg
Teenage Mutant Hero Turtles The Coin-Op! (EU)-603499_back.jpg

software.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
software.Description: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles is an Action game, developed by Probe Entertainment Limited and published by Imageworks, which was released in Europe in 1990.

software.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles World Tour
software.Description: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles World Tour is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Brian A. Rice, Inc. and published by Merit Software, which was released in Europe in 1990.

Release.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles World Tour

software.name: Teenage Queen
software.Description: Teenage Queen is a Miscellaneous game, developed by ERE Informatique and published by Infogrames, which was released in Europe in 1988.

software.name: Tempest
software.Description: Some time into a doubtful future, man has looked far through the depths of space to discover a strange series of constructions linking our space to that of another dimension. These alien artifacts are tunnel-like tubes, through which the hostile forces of another galaxy threaten to pour, destroying all before them. The combined resources of seven planets have built a single craft capable of carrying one man on a desperate mission to stop the building of alien tubes, sealing the aliens in their own universe forever. The mission is to fly the craft round the rim of the tubes, clearing each wave of aggressors until the pilot can blast his ship down the tube to the next section. Only when all the tubes have been cleared and destroyed will the universe be safe!

software.name: Tennis Cup 2
software.Description: Tennis Cup 2 is a Sports game, developed and published by Loriciels, which was released in Europe in 1992.

software.name: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
software.Description: It comes from the future. It can take any shape and survive almost any injury (even when a 10-gauge shotgun blast opens it up like a tin can). Its mission: eliminate John Connor. Its name: the T-1000. Against it stands one hope: you, a terminator model T-800... equipped with on-screen target search displays, a lever-action Winchester, and 10 barrels of high explosives... one mean machine. Protect John Connor (before a 23,000 lb. tow-rig plows your Harley into tomorrow). Save humanity (while Uzi-armed SWAT teams try to blow you away). Terminate the T-1000 (steel mill metldown!)... or mankind is history.

software.name: Terramex
software.Description: Become one of the world's five most reputable explorers and experience the hazards of a dangerous journey to find Professor Eyestrain and deflect the meteor to which only he has the solution. Addictive, compelling and spiced with endless hours of zany humor and brilliant graphics and animation.

software.name: Terrestrial Encounter
software.Description: Terrestrial Encounter is an Action game, developed and published by Solar Software, which was released in Europe in 1986.

software.name: Terrorpods
software.Description: Terrorpods is an Action game, developed and published by Psygnosis, which was released in Europe in 1987.

software.name: Test Drive
software.Description: Test Drive is a Racing game, developed by Distinctive Software and published by Accolade, which was released in 1987.

software.name: Test Drive II Car Disk: The Muscle Cars
software.Description: Test Drive II Car Disk: The Muscle Cars is a Racing game, developed by Distinctive Software and published by Accolade, which was released in Europe in 1990.

Release.name: Test Drive II Car Disk: The Muscle Cars

ReleaseImages.Image: Test Drive II Car Disk The Muscle Cars (EU)-103636_front.jpg

software.name: Test Drive II Car Disk: The Supercars
software.Description: Test Drive II Car Disk: The Supercars is a Racing game, developed by Distinctive Software and published by Accolade, which was released in Europe in 1990.

Release.name: Test Drive II Car Disk: The Supercars

ReleaseImages.Image: Test Drive II Car Disk The Supercars (EU)-103640_front.jpg

software.name: Test Drive II Scenery Disk: California Challenge
software.Description: Test Drive II Scenery Disk: California Challenge is a Racing game, developed by Distinctive Software and published by Accolade, which was released in Europe in 1989.

Release.name: Test Drive II Scenery Disk: California Challenge

ReleaseImages.Image: Test Drive II Scenery Disk California Challenge (EU)-102381_front.jpg

software.name: Test Drive II: The Duel
software.Description: Redline a Lamborghini Diablo - speed shift a Porsche 959 - spin out in a Ferrari F40 - engines roar and cop sirens wail as you blow past your competition at 200 MPH. You'll see it all through the windshield as you scream across scorching deserts, slice through cities and skid around coastline curves - maxing out three of the world's fastest high performance cars.

software.name: Thai Boxing
software.Description: An exciting mixture of boxing and of karate. Boxers movements in 3D provide a unique challenge. Faces on the screen actually show the cuts and bruises received in this gruelling contest of skill and stamina. Featuring eight levels with superbly detailed backdrops and a one or two player option.

software.name: Their Finest Hour: The Battle of Britain
software.Description: Summer, 1940. The German war machine has humbled all of Europe - except Great Britain. Now, the mighty Luftwaffe plans to soften up Southern England for an invasion called Operation Sea Lion. And the RAF must wage a desperate defensive battle against a numerically superior foe. Graphically stunning, historically accurate, and thrillingly realistic, Their Finest Hour: The Battle of Britain resets the stage for the air confrontation of the century. Featuring multiple fighters and bombers to choose from, authentic combat action, unique replay camera, and lots of other special features.

Release.name: Their Finest Hour: The Battle of Britain
Their Finest Hour: The Battle of Britain

software.name: Third Courier, The
software.Description: The Third Courier is an Adventure game, developed by Synergistic Software and published by Accolade, which was released in 1990.

software.name: Thomas the Tank Engine & Friends
software.Description: It's full steam ahead once again for Thomas, he's had a busy week at the Station and now it looks likely this week is going to be just as busy. The Fat Controller's head is spinning with all the special trips he has to organize. He's got to take the children to the seaside, medicine to the hospital, logs to the saw mill, coal to the power station, deliver the mail and take some oil to the oil refinery. It's a good thing that he has Thomas and his friends to rely upon. You control Thomas as he tries to complete all his tasks before the week is over. But be careful not to go too fast, you never know what's round the next corner!

software.name: Thunder Jaws
software.Description: Thunder Jaws is an Action game, developed by The Kremlin and published by Domark, which was released in Europe in 1991.

software.name: Thunderbirds
software.Description: You have just joined THUNDERBIRDS, the famous INTERNATIONAL RESCUE team. Can you help the Tracy family, Brains, Lady Penelope and Parker solve MINE MENACE, SUB CRASH, BANK JOB and ATOMIC TERROR? The world is waiting to be saved. 5... 4... 3... 2... 1... Thunderbirds are GO!

software.name: Thundercats
software.Description: During a raid by the wicked MOLEMEN, agents of the evil MUMM-RA entered the CATS LAIR, kidnapped several members of the Thundercats team, and stole the Eye of Thundera, the magical jewel which holds the mystical power of the Sword of Omens. LION-O was out on a mission when the raid took place but vows that, as the Eye was given into his safekeeping, he must go to the castle Plun-dar, rescue his teammates and retrieve the Eye. Can LION-O battle his way past MUMM-RA's henchmen in the forests and underground caverns, and return the power to the Sword of Omens and glory to the Thundercats name?

software.name: Thunderstrike
software.Description: Thunderstrike is a Simulation game, developed and published by Millenium Interactive, which was released in Europe in 1990.

software.name: ThunderWing
software.Description: ThunderWing is a Simulation game, developed and published by Cascade Games Ltd., which was released in Europe in 1989.

software.name: Time
software.Description: Time is an Adventure game, developed by Oxford Digital Enterprises and published by Empire Interactive, which was released in Europe in 1989.

software.name: Time and Magik
software.Description: Three of Level 9's most acclaimed adventures come together in one package - Lords of Time, Red Moon, and The Price of Magik. And each has been enhanced and enlarged with more text than ever before - 60,000 mind-expanding words creating magic and mystery round every corner. There's a poweful new parser, and most disc versions include stunning digitized pictures that help to dramatically heighten the atmosphere.

software.name: Time Bandit
software.Description: Fast-paced arcade action, full-scale adventures, and endless variety is now only a disc's reach away! Use the Timegates to explore the Worlds of Time: the medieval halls of FANTASY WORLD, the great frontiers of WEST WORLD, and the bizarre future in SPACE WORLD. Choose from more than 20 exciting adventuring areas throughout the game, with over 15 levels in each. That's over 300 variations in all! TIME BANDIT's dual-player mode lets two players in on all the action at the same time - on their OWN playing windows! Work together, or battle it out for a bigger share of the loot.

software.name: Time Machine
software.Description: Stranded in a prehistoric time, the sudden realization of the challenge before you chills your bones. The only way to return to your time zone is to create your own and Man's future. You must manipulate history and use your ingenuity to overcome the environments and creatures you will encounter. Hitch a ride from a pterodactyl, stop the baboons from turning blue, make friends with stone age man and invent the wheel! With your resourcefulness and nerve tested to the full, can you stop the bomb attack and rescue the time machine, now 10 million years in the future?

software.name: Time Soldier
software.Description: Electrocoin brings the environment and excitement of the arcade to the home micro with this SNK conversion. Battle your way through six levels of thrilling action rescuing comrades and defeat the evil 'Gylend'. The game features a complete arcade environment, comprehensive animated effects, special collectible bonus and weapons.

software.name: Times of Lore
software.Description: Enter the Kingdom of Albareth! An action-packed fantasy role-playing game that lets you adventure in strange and faraway lands with super graphics and super fun! Travel along seashores or explore desert ruins. Test your strength, skill, and courage using your sword and wit against your enemies in Times of Lore! Times of Lore is a real-time action game that lets you experience an epic story with you as the hero! The fantasy role-playing game filled with endless fantastic excitement!

software.name: Tintin on the Moon
software.Description: Blistering Barnacles and Thundering Typhoons! Where in Jupiter's name are we? Why did we ever get on Professor Calculus's crazy rocket? And now we've been captured by that ectoplasm Colonel Jorgen and he's trying to scupper the Moon Mission! Only Tintin can save us now! So come on Tintin, save this old Sea Dog from turning into a radioactive kipper. By thunder Tintin, you're the only one who can foil that Sea Gherkin Jorgen and be the first man on the moon!

software.name: Tintin Sur La Lune
software.Description: Blistering Barnacles and Thundering Typhoons! Where in Jupiter's name are we? Why did we ever get on Professor Calculus's crazy rocket? And now we've been captured by that ectoplasm Colonel Jorgen and he's trying to scupper the Moon Mission! Only Tintin can save us now! So come on Tintin, save this old Sea Dog from turning into a radioactive kipper. By thunder Tintin, you're the only one who can foil that Sea Gherkin Jorgen and be the first man on the moon!

software.name: Tiny Skweeks
software.Description: Tiny Skweeks is a Puzzle game, developed by Atreid Concept SA and published by Loriciels, which was released in Europe in 1992.

software.name: Titus the Fox: To Marrakech and Back
software.Description: Titus the Fox: To Marrakech and Back is an Action game, developed and published by Titus Software, which was released in Europe in 1992.

Release.name: Titus the Fox: To Marrakech and Back

software.name: To Be On Top
software.Description: To Be On Top is an Action game, developed and published by Softgold, which was released in Europe in 1991.

software.name: Toki
software.Description: No ugly wart-nose is gonna make a monkey out of me! But that's just what that witch has done - one minute I'm the mighty Toki and the next I'm having breakfast delousing my armpits, I can't walk a step without tripping over my knuckles and, oh, there's an overhanging vine - time to swing out sister! But my broken heart is going ape. My beloved Miho (I can't wait to share a banana with her) has been kidnapped and somehow I've got to regain my manhood - until then I'm just swingin' in the rain!

software.name: Tom & Jerry
software.Description: It's time for "cat and mouse" games again. Make the greedy little mouse, Jerry, jump around the house and garden and stuff himself full of cheese. Trying to put a stop to this is Tom, who as always, ends up worse off for his efforts. But he never gives up hope of catching Jerry and tears all over the house after him. And in "the heat of the battle", he sometimes falls into one of the traps that Jerry has set up for him. All this is devilish fun for Jerry, whose part you play. There's nothing like laughing at someone else's misfortune. Have fun!

software.name: Top Gun
software.Description: The sun shimmers on the horizon as your armed-to-the-teeth Navy fighter screams from the carrier deck, accelerating into the danger zone. High above hostile waters your mission is to defend the task force from enemy attack. Suddenly, bogeys flash onto your radar. They're everywhere, diving toward you at Mach 2. Only a second to react, you go to guns and arm missiles. Your heart pounds and palms sweat as you blast into the dogfight with cannons blazing. Tracers zip past your engines. Shells shatter your senses. Now it's just you against them. And to survive you'll need more than speed and firepower. You'll need guts and instinct. You'll need to be a "TOP GUN" pilot!

software.name: Torvak The Warrior
software.Description: Evil lingers all around... A shadow of despair has been cast all over your homeland. Avenge your people and complete the 600 screens over five levels to the final confrontation with the evil necromancer. Four different weapons to collect as you progress through the game. Collectible bonuses and treasure gain you extra scores. Silver or Gold armor protects you from attack. Find the magic to upgrade your weapon to a Super Weapon! Locate the hidden power-ups enabling more hit power to defeat over 35 alien types.

software.name: Total Eclipse
software.Description: It is 1930 and you have just landed your biplane next to a pyramid dedicated to Re, the sun god. The sun is hot and time is short. For in just two hours the moon will totally eclipse the sun, activating an ancient curse cast upon the Egyptians. Unless you find Re's shrine inside this great pyramid the moon will explode and shower the earth with meteorites. And life as we know it will be destroyed. With time fast running out and armed with only a revolver, wrist watch, compass and water bottle, you must tread your torturous way through the pyramid. Total Eclipse is a totally captivating adventure which will keep you inside the great pyramid for a long, long time.

software.name: Total Recall
software.Description: How would you know if someone stole your mind? As Doug Quaid, you travel to Mars to discover your true identity. Your mission is now a journey of non-stop action, strange mutants, futuristic vehicles and a startling array of weaponry all captured in superbly-executed graphics and gameplay that compliments the success of the year's top movie!

software.name: Tower of Babel
software.Description: Tower of Babel is an intricate 3D strategy game involving an interconnecting network of towers, platforms and lifts all rendered in solid 3D with innovative light and shading techniques. Take control of robot spiders and program them to solve problems and puzzles and interact with other creatures such as Pushers, Zappers and Grabbers. Alternatively, real-time control is available to you at any time for instantaneous reaction to the game's developments. For the more adventurous among you, there is a complete game designer, allowing the construction of your own series of towers, platforms and lifts. Attempt to fox your friends with your own fiendishly difficult creations. More than just a game, more than just a puzzle - Tower of Babel is a whole new concept in strategy gaming!

software.name: Tower Toppler
software.Description: The head honcho over at Destructo Inc. headquarters has sent you to this alien-forsaken planet, Nebulus, to do what you do best. Destroy stuff. Like towers taller than the Empire State Building. What the bonehead also neglected to tell you is that there are 8 of these monuments hidden in the middle of a toxic ocean. And that to get rid of them, you've gotta work your way to the top of them. Plus one more itty bitty detail: The more towers you topple, the tougher the next one gets!

software.name: Towers: Lord Baniff's Deceit
software.Description: Towers: Lord Baniff's Deceit is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by JV Games Inc., which was released in 1994.

software.name: Toyota Celica GT Rally
software.Description: This realistic Rally Sim tests your driving skills over 30 different courses in 3 different countries. Watch for the on-screen prompts from your co-driver as you skid around bends and fly over hills or bridges.

software.name: Tracker
software.Description: Many before you have failed in this grotesque parody of a Gladatorial Rome extinct for 5,000 years, resurrected here in a new and more terrible form. Your opponent is no mortal of flesh and blood, but a machine controlling a lethal force of Cycloids bent on your destruction. At its heart, no heart at all. Just energy, deadly and efficient in its special form of combat. This is the ultimate wargame. Man versus machine. Man versus Centrepoint. The Undefeated Centrepoint.

software.name: Transarctica
software.Description: Transarctica is a Strategy game, developed and published by Silmarils, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: Transylvania
software.Description: Transylvania is an Adventure game, developed and published by Polarware, which was released in 1986.

software.name: Trantor: The Last Stormtrooper
software.Description: Betrayed by his people, TRANTOR is abandoned alone on an Alien planet. His only chance of escape is to activate the planet's main computer that lies within the terminal building. Spectacular sound and graphics transport you light years to the future. Armed only with a flame thrower, fight your way to freedom as TRANTOR... THE LAST STORMTROOPER!

software.name: Trash Heap
software.Description: Trash Heap is an Action game, developed by Tommy Software and published by Diamond, which was released in Europe in 1987.

software.name: Treasure Island Dizzy
software.Description: DIZZY'S CARTOON ADVENTURE ON TREASURE ISLAND STARTS HERE! Explore the mysterious island's deserted Treehouse Village, Fabulous Gold Mines, Huge Caves, Magic Shop and Secret Treasure! You can even go underwater - but remember your snorkel!

software.name: Trex Warrior: 22nd Century Gladiator
software.Description: Trex Warrior: 22nd Century Gladiator is a Simulation game, developed and published by Thalion, which was released in Europe in 1991.

software.name: Trinity
software.Description: Trinity is an Adventure game, developed and published by Infocom, which was released in 1986.

software.name: Trip-A-Tron
software.Description: Trip-A-Tron is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Llamasoft, which was released in Europe in 1988.

software.name: Triton III
software.Description: Are you brave enough to enter the bowels of a sinister alien spacecraft that is approaching earth? Triton III features smooth parallax scrolling and fast-paced action, with enough features to cater to every taste. With 1 or 2 players, 6 increasingly difficult levels, and fuel, shield, time and power-ups to take care of, long term interest is guaranteed.

software.name: Trivia Challenge I
software.Description: Here are nearly 4,000 full length questions ranging from the bizarre to the educational on International Sport, The Arts, Pop Music, Science and Technology and General Interest. Here's your chance to pluck some of the useful and useless information from your brain. With 3 possible answers to each question, you pay your money and you take your choice... but can you beat the clock? Forget diving into the encyclopedia, the Timer will beat you! Here's your chance to enjoy hours of interest, days of frustration and weeks of entertainment.

software.name: Trivial Pursuit: A New Beginning
software.Description: A brand new version of the world's favorite board game created for your computer. The game is based on answering delightfully trivial questions, but the rest is completely new. It's 2045 AD and the earth is a dying planet. Centuries of pollution have left their legacy, and the world has become victim of the 'greenhouse' effect. The object of the game is to reach the faraway, but habitable, planet Genus 2. You do this by blasting off from earth in your spacecraft, traveling through 6 different galaxies, picking up objects on mysterious planets on the way, successfully landing on Genus 2 and satisfying the elders that you are worthy enough to stay. Answer questions at each stage of the journey.

software.name: Trivial Pursuit: Genus-Edition
software.Description: Trivial Pursuit: Genus-Edition is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Oxford Digital Enterprises and published by Domark, which was released in Europe in 1988.

software.name: Troubadours
software.Description: Take up your quill pen, get your lute tuned and follow the trails of the medieval knights. On your way you will be confronted with a very delicate mission: To be able to discover important signs and to pass a whole lot of tests, a good knowledge of English and of poetry as well as a good ear for music will be indispensible. Have confidence in your talent and in your imagination and don't forget - Corwin the magician will always be near to help you out of difficult situations.

software.name: Turbo Cup
software.Description: Thrill to the excitement of Championship Sports Car racing! Drive at speed in excess of 120 MPH!! Practice on each course first, before competing in a head to head race. Turbo Cup Challenge features accurate representations of four of the most exciting race tracks in Europe - MAGNY-COURS, DUON-PRENOIS, NOGARO, and PAUL RICARD. You would never have believed that a computer could so accurately recreate all the excitement and danger of top class motor racing!!

software.name: Turbo GT
software.Description: Turbo GT is a Racing game, developed and published by ERE Informatique, which was released in Europe in 1987.

software.name: Turbo OutRun
software.Description: Turbo Out Run takes you on a 16 stage race across America. Along the way you will battle bumper to bumper with good guys and bad guys, police cars, Porsches and blown engines. Numerous scenes will take you through congested city streets, over snow and icy mountain passes and across sunbaked deserts. Drive daytime and night time - go for manual or auto gearbox selection, even customize your Ferrari F40 with High Grip Tires, but whatever else you do... use the Turbo booster power sparingly - THIS BABY'S HOT AND RARING TO GO!!

software.name: Turrican
software.Description: From beyond the edge of darkness, evil incarnate is back. He is Morgul, master of all the fears and nightmares of mankind. As a world trembles in sleepless terror, a single warrior emerges - you are Turrican! Battle through the five worlds of darkness encountering thunder and storm, mechanical monsters, hidden rooms, awesome end of level guardians, reptillian beasts, and anywhere... the unexpected! Featuring 13 levels with over 1,300 screens, 10 hi-tech weapons systems, multi-directional scrolling, 20 musically excellent soundtracks, countless special effects and bonus features, and 50 different aliens and 8 gigantic end-level monsters.

software.name: Turrican II: The Final Fight
software.Description: TURRICAN fought an epic battle against Morgul and won a stunning victory against great odds. Once again he embarks on a rescue mission. Five worlds and twelve levels await him in his final fight against the remnants of Morgul's creation.

software.name: Tusker
software.Description: One man's dream has become another man's destiny. As Tusker you'll experience all the thrills, danger and excitement of Africa as you go in search of your father's dream... the elephant's graveyard! An arcade-style adventure game filled with many hours of great puzzling.

software.name: TV Sports Football
software.Description: The crowd's roaring. TV cameras are rolling. You're in a pro football war more real than you've ever played. Digitized sound lets you feel every bone-crunching hit. Call all the plays and audibles. Then control a sophisticated offense and slashing, head-bashing defense as TV announcers broadcast the game. It's fast, furious action for up to 5 players! Battle through a full season schedule to the League Championship!

software.name: Typhoon Thompson in Search for the Sea Child
software.Description: Typhoon Thompson in Search for the Sea Child is an Action game, developed by Dan Gorlin Productions and published by Broderbund, which was released in 1989.

Release.name: Typhoon Thompson in Search for the Sea Child

software.name: Ultima II: The Revenge of the Enchantress
software.Description: Create your own alter ego who will perform brave and daring feats in your honor. Together, step through the doors of time and explore the far reaches of the galaxy. Battle fierce monsters and cunning brigands. Finally, face the all-powerful enchantress, Minax, in a duel unequaled in the annals of time.

Release.name: Ultima II: The Revenge of the Enchantress

ReleaseImages.Image: Ultima II The Revenge of the Enchantress (US)-19665_front.jpg

software.name: Ultima III: Exodus
software.Description: Upon escaping the crumbling ruins of Shadowguard, the black fortress of Minax, you lay your weary body on the now-sacred ground. As you rest, you remember your first encounter with the evil wizard of Mondain, whom you later tracked down and destroyed. The existence of his apprentice, Minax, was soon revealed and the crusade was begun again. Younger and more cunning than her mentor, she has been much more difficult to vanquish. But now your sense of accomplishment is touched by a chilling fear. Have all vestiges of evil been removed? Somehow, you sense that your treacherous foes have not been eliminated. Without further feats of skill, daring and perseverance, all of your past accomplishments may be lost. You stand up, prepare your armor, and walk to the dimension door. Stepping in, the hunt resumes.

software.name: Ultima IV: Quest of the Avatar
software.Description: Prepare yourself for a grand adventure: Ultima IV, sixteen times larger than Ultima III, is a milestone in computer gaming. Lord British has produced a game to challenge, not only your physical and mental skills, but the true fabric of your character. The evil triad of Mondain, Minax, and the hellspawn Exodus, have been vanquished and peace reigns throughout the land of Britannia. Evil yet abounds, but in isolated pockets and in the hearts of men. A new age awaits the coming of one who can conquer evil on all frontiers through the mastery of both magic and the use of force. Daemons, dragons, and long-dead wizards still plague the countryside and must be destroyed. The seeker on the path of the Avatar will face hostile groups composed of mixed enemy types and will survive such encounters only by strategic use of weapons and terrain. Earthly victories over seemingly impossible odds lead to the final conflict, where the ultimate challenge - the self - awaits...

Release.name: Ultima IV: Quest of the Avatar

ReleaseImages.Image: Ultima IV Quest of the Avatar (US)-19684_front.jpg
Ultima IV Quest of the Avatar (US)-19684_back.jpg

software.name: Ultima V: Warriors of Destiny
software.Description: Enter the realm of Britannia: a world rich in history, adventure, and intrigue. Lord British, the benevolent ruler of Britannia, has been lost on an expedition to explore the vast reaches of a newly discovered underworld. Panic erupts in Britannia when the sole survivor of the expedition returns with dread tales of their fate. To restore peace, the trusted but ambitious subject, Blackthorn seizes control of Britannia. His fanatical devotion to order ultimately transforms him into a self-righteous tyrant. Now, Britannia's destiny depends on your ability to discover the fate of Lord British and to unseat the merciless Blackthorn.

software.name: Ultima VI: The False Prophet
software.Description: Journey once again to Britannia, land of magic and adventure. Uncover the mystery of the Gargoyles in this exciting sixth episode of the award-wining ULTIMA saga. All-new graphics and sound technology! Cinematic storytelling at its best! Simulation of a living fantasy world! Hours of non-stop entertainment!

software.name: UMS II: Nations at War
software.Description: The original UMS has been extensively developed to allow you full control over entire Nations At War. Across land, sea, and by air, relive the battles of Alexander the Great, the Napoleonic Wars, and the D-Day landings of 1945. Up to 50 players can wage war simultaneously. Your sphere of control encompasses all aspects of military command, from the strategic planning of campaigns across continents to issuing battle orders to small units of field troops. Utilization of accurately simulated military hardware, enduring the rigors of battle through extremes of climate, and a total awareness of the politics of warfare must be learnt for success. The chance to re-write history is in your hands.

software.name: UMS: The Universal Military Simulator
software.Description: The Universal Military Simulator is the most sophisticated Battle Strategy software you'll ever have used. From ancient battles of Classic History to the bloodiest Science Fiction fantasies, UMS lets you recreate them all with its unique 3D graphics system. The program comes complete with 5 pre-programmed historical battles: Gettysburg, Arbella, Hastings, Marston Moor and Waterloo, each with the high standard of accuracy and attention to detail which you demand from State-of-the-Art Strategy software. You no longer have to settle for inferior graphics, or worse, no graphics at all. UMS depicts each battle on a unique 3D grid system, allowing you to view the battles from almost any angle you desire, from an overview of the whole battle, right in to examine an individual unit in its immediate environment.

software.name: UMS: The Universal Military Simulator - The American Civil War
software.Description: The Universal Military Simulator brought to life ancient battles of classic history. Now, recreate the legendary struggles of the American Civil War on extraordinary 3D contoured landscapes. Plan your strategy from an overhead view, or zoom in on individual units. Design your own maps, order of battles and objectives, or re-enact the three memorable battles as they were. Through it all, you are in command.

Release.name: UMS: The Universal Military Simulator - The American Civil War

ReleaseImages.Image: UMS The Universal Military Simulator - The American Civil War (EU)-100457_front.jpg
UMS The Universal Military Simulator - The American Civil War (EU)-100457_back.jpg

software.name: UMS: The Universal Military Simulator - Vietnam
software.Description: The Universal Military Simulator brought to life ancient battles of classic history. Now you can extend the life of the program with Vietnam: Scenario Disc Two. Written by historian Edward Bever, Ph.D., author of Conflict in Vietnam plus a number of strategy simulation programs, Bever brings to your screen the reality of this devastating war.

Release.name: UMS: The Universal Military Simulator - Vietnam

ReleaseImages.Image: UMS The Universal Military Simulator - Vietnam (EU)-100456_front.jpg
UMS The Universal Military Simulator - Vietnam (EU)-100456_back.jpg

software.name: Uninvited
software.Description: Well now, an uninvited guest! We don't get many visitors knocking at our door way out here. Now don't be afraid. I'm very sorry to hear about your car. Driving a little too fast, were we? Well, everything is all right now, come along inside. Don't mind the door... the hinges squeak a bit. And if I were you, I wouldn't look too closely at those shadows. One never knows what might be lurking around this musty old place. What's that? You just want to find your brother, use the phone, and go? After so short a stay? Well, if you can find a phone you can certainly use it, and as to the leaving, I suppose anything is possible...

software.name: Untouchables, The
software.Description: Take on the mob! The ultimate six exciting action sequences put you in control of Elliot Ness's elite squad of crime-busters. Alleyway shootouts, the Border Raid, the Railway Station confrontation and Warehouse bust, culminating in the thrilling denouement of a rooftop duel as you re-live the knife-edge existence of Ness in his stuggle against the retribution of Capone! The Untouchables - live an American legend!

software.name: Uridium
software.Description: Uridium is an Action game, developed by Graftgold and published by Mindscape Inc., which was released in 1988.

software.name: Utopia
software.Description: Utopia is a Strategy game, developed by Celestial Software and published by Gremlin Interactive, which was released in Europe in 1991.

software.name: Vaxine
software.Description: Antibodies... Defense... Eliminate... Repel... You need... VAXINE virus... Attack... Human... Alien... Invasion... Poison... Mutant... Clone... Reproduce... Survival? Featuring 100% ray-traced graphics, extra shooting stars bonus level, ad lib and Roland sonic support, over 100 colors on screen and digitized sound.

software.name: Verminator
software.Description: Verminator is an Action game, developed and published by MicrO-Style, which was released in Europe in 1989.

software.name: Videokid
software.Description: Videokid is an Action game, developed by Twilight Games and published by Gremlin Interactive, which was released in Europe in 1992.

software.name: Vigilante
software.Description: On the baddest streets of the city they know your name. You are lean and mean... the karate master they call the Vigilante! Your turf was left alone. Your friends and neighbors lived in peace. Until the Rogue gang got too big for their britches. You chilled, hoping things wouldn't get too rough. No such luck. They've taken your girlfriend Maria, and there's only one thing you can do... get her back... anyway you can! You have fists of steel! Legs like pistons! And courage that just won't quit! You will need all three because the Rogues are waiting with knives, guns and a whole bunch of nasty punks. And you'll have to fight fast. If the Rogues make it back to their headquarters before you rescue Maria, all hope will be lost. But catch them first and you'll fight the leader of the Rogues. Win Maria... and your turf... will remain safe. Feel any pressure? No way. You're the Vigilante!

software.name: Virus
software.Description: This lightning fast shoot-out takes place over a startling three dimensional landscape which undulates below as you pilot your heavily-armed Hoverplane, skimming across the surface on a death defying mission. Invading alien Seeders, Drones and Mutants are attacking the planet, polluting the surface with a creeping, poisonous red virus. Your mission: to halt this rapidly spreading virus before the land is defoliated. Throw the full might of your Hoverplane's powerful laser cannon and homing missiles against a variety of marauding spacecraft, each with its own deadly strategy.

software.name: Vixen
software.Description: Just when you thought it was safe to go back into the jungle... VIXEN - a game beyond imagination in a world beyond belief. Fantastic sideways-scrolling arcade action. Screen after screen of whip-cracking excitement. Hordes of evil and vicious reptilian nasties. Incredible graphics and film-like video digitized animation. Spectacular music and sound effects.

software.name: Volleyball Simulator
software.Description: With this program you have a very realistic and accurate simulation of a proper volleyball game, with 12 players. All rules and regulations are the same as in real volleyball! You can play alone against the computer, or get a friend to control the opposing team - both ways have their own special attractions! Thanks to the comprehensive tactics editor you can be the trainer of your team. You can choose which players will play aggressively and which defensively, and also decide the positions of the members of your team!

software.name: Voodoo Nightmare
software.Description: Voodoo Nightmare is an Adventure game, developed by Boots Barker and published by Palace Software, which was released in 1990.

software.name: Voyager
software.Description: Voyager is an Action game, developed and published by Ocean, which was released in Europe in 1989.

software.name: Vroom
software.Description: Experience the emotions and thrills of a race driver on the track. Take part in his breathtaking braking and acceleration in the hell of the Formula One race. VROOM offers you supreme arcade-action and assures you of a racing game of exceptional smoothness and speed! Unique graphic environments and realistic sound effects are combined with incomparable suppleness of control. Assess the performance of your competitors in practice laps and qualifying rounds, then thrash them in the Championship races!

software.name: Vroom Multi-Player
software.Description: Vroom Multi-Player is a Racing game, developed and published by Lankhor, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Vroom New Circuits Data Disk
software.Description: Off we go for a new high-speed Formula One World Championship competition! The VROOM Data Disc offers you once again the thrilling excitement of a formula one racing driver and presents you 6 new Grand Prix circuits.

software.name: Wall Street Wizard
software.Description: Wall Street Wizard is a Strategy game, developed by Expert and published by Lifetimes, which was released in Europe in 1988.

software.name: War in Middle Earth
software.Description: The whole of J.R.R. Tolkien's panoramic vision has been included in this epic game. Follow in the footsteps of Frodo, Aaragorn and Gandalf as they battle to get the ring to the Cracks of Doom. Ranged against you are all the evil forces of the Dark Lord Sauron and the corrupt wizard Saruman. The odds are overwhelming, but you cannot aford to fail. The destiny of Middle Earth lies in the balance. Multiple playing levels let you control all the characters and armies that appear in "The Lord of the Rings" from the broad sweep of strategy, right down to individual characters' actions on the battlefield. There are infinite possibilities so no two games will ever be the same. Gripping action means you will always want another game. Guard carefully and travel well, my friend. May the fellowship of the ring be successful, and peace return to all Middle Earth.

software.name: War in the Gulf
software.Description: War in the Gulf is a Simulation game, developed by Oxford Digital Enterprises and published by Empire Interactive, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: Wargame Construction Set
software.Description: Have you ever dreamed of designing your own war games, to draw your own battlemaps and create soldiers and scenarios that are limited only by your imagination? Now you can! This refreshingly different game gives you the unique opportunity to create battles from any period in military history, from ancient wars with spears and catapults to modern conflicts using advanced missiles and tanks. You can even suspend reality and engage in sword-and-sorcery fantasy adventures or science fiction battles. If you don't want to make up your own scenarios, don't worry. We've provided 8 ready-to-play games, all of which can be modified to suit your liking. We can go on forever about the incredible flexibility, features and challenges this exciting game has to offer, but why read when you can play it and discover for yourself!

software.name: Warhead
software.Description: Warhead is an Action game, developed by Motion Picture House and published by Activision, which was released in Europe in 1990.

software.name: Warlock's Quest
software.Description: Warlock's Quest is an Adventure game, developed and published by ERE Informatique, which was released in Europe in 1988.

software.name: Warlock: The Avenger
software.Description: Warlock: The Avenger is an Action game, developed by Electralyte and published by Millennium, which was released in Europe in 1991.

software.name: Warp
software.Description: Destroy the energy stations in this action-filled shoot-'em-up! At the end of each completed level you must guide your craft through the warp tunnel, a 3D flight sequence, to reach the next, higher level. You will need strength, planning and strategy in order to find the maps and energy dumps, as well as a host of other features.

software.name: Wayne Gretzky Hockey
software.Description:
Face off with the "Great One" Number "99," Wayne Gretzky, nine time winner of the NHL's MVP award and the leading point scorer in the history of the game. Designed with Wayne and other hockey professionals, this riveting simulation is packed with all the excitement and hard-hitting action that could be squeezed into the Nintendo Entertainment System. From the adrenaline rush of a breakaway goal to the tension of Sudden Death Overtime, WAYNE GRETZKY HOCKEY takes you onto the ice for the ultimate test of skill.
Incredibly Realistic Design and Graphics -Options include multiple game speeds and difficulty levels, a practice mode, and adjustable period lengths. -Control any skater on the ice. -Play against the computer, another player, you and a friend can battle the computer as teammates, or sit back and watch the computer play for you. -Breathtaking overhead graphics let you experience the brillant stick-work, the finesse of a passing game, the thrill of a last second save, or the crunch of a bone-wrenching body check! -Animated refs make the penalty calls!

software.name: Ween: The Prophecy
software.Description: Ween: The Prophecy is an Adventure game, developed and published by Coktel Vision, which was released in Europe in 1992.

software.name: Weird Dreams
software.Description: This is the computer game that everyone is talking about - or soon will be - in excited whispers and bewildered exclamations. It's the game with the soccer ball that devours knife-wielding little girls... then burps. The one with totem pole heads hopping on kangaroo bodies under skies full of fish. The one with a giant killer bee that wants your cotton candy, the grandfather clock that paints the way, and the lawn mower that grinds you to a bloody pulp. Like the famous ink blot test, the bizarre scenes, puzzles and arcade-style challenges in Weird Dreams will mean different things to different people. Some will think them uproariously funny. Others will find them strange and unsettling. Still others will be outright offended. Decide for yourself. One thing is certain: there has never been a computer game like Weird Dreams. You have to play it to believe it.

software.name: Werner
software.Description: Werner is an Action game, developed and published by Ariolasoft, which was released in Europe in 1987.

software.name: Where Time Stood Still
software.Description: Your plane has ditched on a mountainous plateau somewhere in deepest Tibet. You and your companions are alive, but recovery from the impact is short lived - a large shape is moving toward you, as it gets closer you rub your eyes in disbelief; a Dinosaur! - where are you... and when? Now learn to survive in a world untouched by modern life - a world frozen in time.

software.name: Whirligig
software.Description: WHIRLIGIG - The first-ever game to use LIGHTSOURCE 3D - Maelstrom's revolutionary system of shaded ultra-solid 3D graphics! An epic all-action game featuring lightning-fast speeds of play, graphic techniques BEYOND the arcade, 4 billion sectors to explore, 100 billion enemy ships to blast, and an awesome final objective to reach!

software.name: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
software.Description: Who Framed Roger Rabbit is an Action game, developed by Inference and published by Buena Vista Games, which was released in 1988.

software.name: Wicked
software.Description: The Universe is alive, held together by the power of good. But evil has penetrated the 12 great constellations through portals of destruction. It is spreading fast, fighting for domination, growing ever stronger. You are called upon, a mere mortal, to purge the Universe of evil in service of the Sun God. Learn to hate the force of evil. Defeat it! Discover its many guises, its strengths and its weaknesses; sporing, settling, spreading - it's silent, it's cunning and it's... WICKED!

software.name: Wild Streets
software.Description: The chief of intelligence has been kidnapped. The CIA is counting on your natural survival skills and the hunter's instincts of the Black Panther, the magnificent predator trained especially for your protection, to go and find the chief. Not just one man's life is at stake, but the complete CIA operations network is being undermined. Right now the mafia's terrorists are torturing their prisoner in order to get the names of the agents leading the fight against organized crime and drug dealing. Both you and your ally are deposited, by helicopter, near the spot where the chief was last seen before his disappearance. Prepare yourself for a fight to the death, but remember to only use your gun when all else fails.

software.name: Willow
software.Description: Long ago, in a time of magic and sorcery, an evil sorceress named Queen Bavmorda ruled the land under a reign of terror. A baby has been born who, legend foretells, will destroy the wicked ruler but the Queen vows the slay the child first. Now the villagers of Nelwyn must band together to assist Willow, the child's chosen protector. As Willow, you must travel through mysterious forests and villages - first evading the Queen and her demons, then plotting to end her reign of terror. You will accumulate an arsenal of swords, shields, and most importantly magic, which are necessary for your final confrontation. Outnumbered by the Nockmaar Army, you must rely on inner strength and determination to destroy the evil Queen - before it's too late!

software.name: Wind Surf Willy
software.Description: Wind Surf Willy is a Sports game, developed and published by Silmarils, which was released in Europe in 1988.

software.name: Wings of Death
software.Description: The latest sensation in shoot-'em-up action! Loaded with awesome features such as: Seven levels of death-defying action. Five totally different weapon systems. Additional bolt-on weaponry. Fifteen bonus types. Chunky animated end monsters. Extensive end sequence. Over 1 megabyte of graphics. Smooth scrolling. Up to 95 objects on screen simultaneously. Digitized sound effects. Music with digital effects. And much more!

software.name: Winter Olympiad 88
software.Description: Winter Olympiad 88 is a Sports game, developed and published by Tynesoft, which was released in Europe in 1988.

software.name: Winzer
